element.name: Living Diamond
element.source: Hex's Notes on Magic and Combat

description.p: A white rock that vaguely resembles an uncut diamond.
This rock has 3 charges. Each charge is equivalent to a diamond worth 100gp that can be consumed for a resurrection spell.
The stone regains 1 charge after 10 days.

element.name: Unstoppable Rod
element.source: Hex's Notes on Magic and Combat

description.p: This flat iron rod has a button on one end. You can use an action to press the button, which causes the rod to continue to move magically. Until you or another creature uses an action to push the button again, the rod continues to move at a constant speed and direction, even if it is defying gravity. The rod can handle up to 8,000 pounds of opposing force. More force causes the rod to deactivate and fall. A creature can use an action to make a DC 30 Strength check, to alter the movement of the rod for 6 seconds on a success.
